title: I WILL TELL YOU WHY I WANT TO LEAVE LEAGUE
body:
Nowadays lol is so unballanced, not like a few years ago, when kassadin had silence on his Q that lasts 10 years and was almost permabaned on rankeds. It was fair when rengar and kha zix were almost in every game on every lane possible and game was exciting back then, and one of my favourite when poppy, sion, maokai and almost every single tank could kill alone half of the enemy team, nobody complained. 

It was possible to carry games alone even with bad team, because fed enemies did not get gold from their kills and every your kill gave you bonus 100 ad, ap, reset of cd and 5.0 attack speed limit for 30 days. Carrying alone your team when everybody fed was never easier than few years ago, nobody complained. 

Everyone in every single league was playing like a mad man, faker back then would be in gold. Nobody was feeding, games were not lost in 10 minutes because it is 10/0 for your enemies and every single player was winning, thanks to great matchmaking system from the past that was created by Zuckerberg himself, nobody complained. 

A few years ago people was not trolling, even though nobody had their lane picked by the system, there was no such a thing like a pick order, "the last one picks support"   or "I have written first in my chat, so mid or troll". People were good teammates and honoring system was just not necessary, because everyone was a lovely person to his teammates and his enemies, nobody complained.  

You may say that items, items were great. Yeah, that was the reason they had to delete lantern from the game, because jax, Warwick and so on were just perfectly fine with it, that's why nobody complained. 

Also, my favourite one, champion diversity was so much better, I mean there was no time in a history of league that the only bans were blitz, shen, malphite and kassadin for a fcking year or more I guess. Every. Single. Game. 

#######################

I know league can be frustrating, unfair or even stupid but it is just like it has been all the time. And every other game with PvP has the same problems. This game have changed but less than most of the people here are trying to show. It was not better in the past and I am pretty sure that it was much worse but people used to remember old days as a great time. Grow up and stop complaining about everything or at least stop saying that league was greater back then, because it wasn't. Enjoy the game how it is, say what should be changed or just end the journay with it and keep only  the good memories but don't wish old league to come back, it won't and I am so fucking glad about that. 
Peace.

I left cause of the horrible, random, and unpolished buffs and nerfs. The massive focus on balancing everything by pro play (As if everyone is a pro.). The toxic community, no item variation, unbalanced runes (either useless or overpowered.), champion priority, and unstable meta.

League has improved, but that doesn't mean that it's fun. The main reason for my leave is the horrible, random, and unpolished buffs and nerfs, champion priority, and unstable meta.

My all-time favorite champ Zoe got gutted. Though her play-style is very easily countered and champions more or as cancerous exist, but never got the same treatment, as Zoe. Too many, one type champions are prioritized, such as ADC, Tanks, Mages, Fighters, and Assassins without a balance of champion priority. ADC or Tanks are the main choices of priority, which is fucking annoying. Which then lead into meta. Tank meta, ADC meta, for fuck sack make a stable meta, where all can have some form of play priority. It's annoying to see that my Zoe got gutted because she can one-shot a mage or ADC.
At least Quinn got some QoL, but then she got gutted because of ADC and bruiser mains cried.
Ryze is weak unless if your good.
Shen got nerfed for no sensible reason except for Pro Play as an excuse, same with Braum.
Yi got buffed even though pros and lower agreed that it's a bad idea.
And so on.
If the bot isn't the main priority, they will cry. You know what? I'm fed up with depending on you fuckers to do anything and have hope that you will do good so I can win. When I saw your ADC's got nerfed, I was so happy. Now we are back to ADC meta, FUCK ME.
Hey Riot, at least we mage, tank, and support mains don't complain about our champions being weak all the fucking time, but it seems you only listen to crybabies. 

That why I left.

I loved S5, 6, and 7. S8 not as much.

You can keep playing the game, I won't stop you. But telling me that they are doing sensible changes when it comes to balancing at the moment is misguiding.

You can also read my post, "My Biased Farewell": https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/general-discussion/MOzEdnVJ-my-biased-farewell

Look at my acc, do I look like a guy that plays adcs? I only played jhin season ago or something like that because I think he is one of the best champions in the game if it comes to design. 

I have never claimed that they make good changes, in fact, I have said that they have sucked all the time in ballancing. I think this game is better because of some changes, at least for me, but for sure it doesn't have good ballance and it never had and never will. 

Zoe was just op and annoying for every player, not only for adcs and that's good they nerfed her so now only really good players are capable of having high win rate with her. Maybe they made it a bit too far but still I have seen a great zoe players in my and my enemies team. 

Shen is still strong imo and me and my friend had a great time playing him on support or top, he still is able to have a huge impact on the game. 

I hate that almost every meta must be around adcs, supports or tanks, because most of their mains, aspecially adc mains, are crying that they champions are not hypercarrys anymore and I really liked meta with heimer, swain etc. on bot as an adc. So I really understand you there. But that used to be a thing in league since the beginning of the game.

I feel like they changed their balancing team out or something recently. Season 8 is a pretty big joke. Not to mention minion block is just stupid now.... it used to be so much more manageable but I have got stuck against walls from minions and forced to kms to enemies before.

Edit: Season 5, 6, and 7 were also bad. Not this bad though.

Ballancing team better nerf irelia. 
I guess it is the same team that gave kog'maw over 5.0 attack speed, rengar Q that was aoe capable to deal 3000 raw damage with full build, made armor pene so all champions that benefit from it can burst any dps in a second. They also probably ballanced old gragas with 120% ap on his ult and 100% on his Q, both of these skill shots were also much faster. They were doing great job for a long, long time.

I have the unpopular opinion of I like how the game is. I like how much damage their is. If you're good you can put in work. In the end, no matter how anyone looks at it, you win games based off how well you play. No matter what it's a 50% chance to win a League game. You and your team either play well, or you don't. Some people complain a champion does too much damage but they're also probably in a terrible match up and can't trade properly because of it. There are so many factors. We all have access to the same tools though.

I miss the tank meta, where fights too a while...
Sure there were some facerolling champions, but overall you had much more response time than the .25 seconds you get nowadays... Felt a lot better overall.
Furthermore, I've never been one for watching pro play, I felt like it was boring. But oh my god... this season/last are shit. Complete and utter shit. Unlike previously you can't even watch to learn anything at all. IT's just a shit show for 20-40 minutes that's almost entirely a one sided stomp.... Damn

In tank meta tanks could easly kill any dps in a seconds while he was stunned by them while being tanky as hell. It was in my opinion the worst meta in the history of metas, maybe ever. But for real, it was awful that the easiest class was also the most rewarding. 

Team fights maybe last longer in such a meta but most of the players are cced during it and feel pretty useless, unless you were tank.

Do you remember kha zix and rengar after their release? They could one shot any dps in the game for quite long. 
Old kassadin and lebronze that had more damage plus this bullshit silence that allowed you only to wait for death. 
Akali with her 3 ults vaporizing any dps in a second dashing all the time. 
Old talon with his silence and no damage over time but just straight burst. I was playing him and I can ensure you that he was killing in less than a second back in season 4.
Viktor after his rework was E, Q, aa and you were dead so against casual Player you had like maybe 1 second to react or even less, before Thunderlord and lichbane proceed with his auto attack. 

I can only agree that lcs are ruining this game for most of the players but they were doing it since the beggining of them so for like 5 years I guess? And I actually feel it more in lower elo as in higher people rather choose their main champion or one of the mains I guess. 

Also for game being faster, well it is my personal preference but I like it very much actually. However, I understand that it might be frustrating for other people.

I prefer back at the day where it was 1 or 2 champions/items at the same time who were op, compaired to today where we rotate between entire classes of champs who become insta-wins.

Say all you want about snowballing or tanks in old league, at least teamfights were actually longer than 8 seconds and didn't result in "burst of be burst" everysingle time

Armor pene meta? Mages rework? And in tank meta tanks could easly kill any dps in a seconds while he was stunned by them while being tanky as hell. There were also a bunch of op champions back in those "old" days, but people only remember few of them that were the most op or somehow iconic for that time. 

Team fights maybe last longer in such a meta but most of the players are cced during it and feel pretty useless, unless you were tank.
